But I am much happier that you will be all right, Kakyoin.
He did not cut my pupils, so I have been told it will heal soon.
In junior high, one of my classmates was hit by a baseball
so hard that his eye was mashed in,
but he was fine by the next day.
It was just fluid leaking out of his eyeball.
In a few days, I can take off my bandages.
I will catch up with you then.
We are less than 800 kilometers from Dio's lair in Cairo.
Everyone, please continue on, and be careful.
Hmm, the numbers on this receipt from the hospital...
And this dot is actually zero, and this 7 is a 6?
A 4. So, the amount we owe is...
And here I thought he was just waiting outside.
He is a hit with chicks!
I wonder why he is chewing gum.
Let me give you some advice.
You would best get away from that dog.
but in general, he hates people.
If you let your guard down,
W-We do not get along at all!
We are heading in, you lovebirds.
They say the ancient Egyptians always buried their dead
beyond the Nile's boundary, where the sun sets.
That is why the whole city is on the east side of the Nile.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
All structures built on the west side involve graves and the dead.
But our enemies do not care about east or west.
They will attack from every direction.
Man, your cow is so lazy.
Who the hell do you take after?
The cow and the kid both look just like you!
Hey, maybe the owner's around somewhere.
I bet he is in a panic if he dropped this.
Maybe it is just some antique that is been lying around.
Should we take it to the cops?
We could make a fortune if we sold it.
But I am the one who found it...
If it is just a replica, it is worthless.
It will not budge at all!
The blade is not even showing at all!
If I cannot do it, there is no way you could, idiot!
The blade would not even come out!
I have not touched anything but its hilt!
Let me try to get the sword out, too!
If you want to try, then just do it!
I did not even have to pull hard.
I can hear the blade ringing...
I-I am no expert on swords or anything,
but I have never seen a blade this beautiful.
It looks like a Japanese sword!
It is as if the blade were wet...
You should not be holding it!
Y-You were standing behind me, Dad.
What the hell are you doing?!
Hurry up and take him to a doctor!
Th-There is something weird about this sword!
It is like it is got a mind of its own!
I can hear a voice from somewhere...
I am the Stand whose card
suggests the God of the Dead and the guardian of the graveyard.
You are an expert in swordsmanship.
Both he and Dad deserved to die.
I feel like slicing you up, too.
You are stronger than anyone and can cut anything!
Do we really have time to stop here?
As long as they let us ride the ferry, we cannot complain.
Let us get something to eat.
For now, that will have to do.
Well, do not worry about it.
By the way, where is the restroom?
Let us go look for one.
Papyrus is what paper's made of.
Why not buy some as a memento?
It is totally the real thing?
This piece was made by a famous Egyptian craftsman.
If it were real, it would not rip so easily.
Where did Mr. Joestar and the others go?
That stupid dog totally gave me the slip...
to attack with so many people around.
You guys usually do not let us see you, or attack us head-on.
I did not think any of you were like that.
I am the user of the Stand which suggests the God of Death, Anubis.
That is a pretty straightforward line.
You are a tougher, more manly enemy than I thought.
Come at me with that Anubis Stand of yours!
He is got a sword, but...
Does he plan to fight me with that sword instead of using his Stand?
The way he wields the sword, his stance...
The sword passed through the pillar.
And my shirt is not cut!
He somehow cut just me, but not my shirt!
If I had not kept my distance, I would be dead now.
I-I do not know which pillar he went behind.
That Stand can phase through matter to cut its target.
My Chariot is only able to strike at a bit more than a meter, at best...
He is got me at a disadvantage.
Attacking me, Polnareff, with a sword and getting a hit in...
But this is the end of you and your confidence.
All I have to do is stay away from the pillars!
You are not going to pop up out of the ground at me, are ya?!
I can do more than just pass through them!
I can cut the pillars themselves in half, too!
That is Chariot's secret technique, which not even Jojo knows about.
If an opponent dodged that, I would be unarmed.
So I only use that attack when I am in real trouble.
Well, I guess he is not dead.
Definitely down for the count, though.
The sword's still in its scabbard.
Did it just slip back in by chance?
Now that I see this sword up close,
I think I will pull it out more...
You went off by yourself, so we were worried.
What if the enemy attacked you?
I am not sure if it is because
I turned around too quick, or because of my wound, but I feel so out of it.
Did you step on a turd?
A stupid guy decided to attack me.
He said he was the Stand Anubis's user.
He was an expert swordsman, able to phase through objects and cut them.
Of course, he definitely was not as strong as me,
He attacked me with this swor
Mice are trying to take the sword!
So thieving mice living down here?
If you are going to steal, steal some damn cheese!
Now the sword is in so tight, I cannot get it out.
I am glad that you are safe, but we should always travel in pairs.
Our enemy will not hesitate to attack anyone who is found alone.
We are going to Edfu today.
What are you going to do with that sword?
I am going to hand it over to the police, since it is clearly a dangerous weapon.
If you left it in those ruins, you do not know who might pick it up.
What if we get thrown out?
What the hell is with you today?
Well, the damn dog will not shut up.
I guess I should take care of it now.
I thought we told you not to go off on your own!
Should not we get to the police station?
A man's got to look his best, right?
Hey, Pops, would you put this sword over there?
No matter how you look at it, it is clearly a dangerous weapon.
I was rolling around so much yesterday
that this handsome nice guy got all dirty.
This ought to be the best part of a haircut!
Now it is cutting good and close.
That is so... good to hear.
Could you get under my chin, too?
Right here... underneath your chin, correct?
The sword itself is a Stand!
I will not lose to someone I have faced before!
The more I fight him, the faster his attacks become.
